title: [Silver+][EUW]Searching for teammates to play and stay for long time.

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
I am recruting for my Ranked team and what i had in mind was a team with 5+ members and we practice to get better at league play flex,solo/duo etc... and
rank up together as a team while we learn out of our mistakes and missplays.

What i want from you guys is that you play actively and when not active for a longer time there should be a note of absence or something similar.
That you guys dont tilt your teammates for mistakes but rather tell them the mistake and help them to improve.
That you wanna improve yourself to get better at league and aquire a better rank than you currently are in.

I offer a discord server with enought space for you guys to be in with.
Skirmish games against enemies to practice our skill.
A good leader wich is willing to listen to improvments.
A nice time with me and more players in the future.
